import React,{ useState} from 'react' function HireForm() { const [eventForm,setForm]=useState({}); const handleForm=(e)=>{ setForm({...eventForm,[e.target.name]:e.target.value}) } const saveEvent=async (e)=>{ e.preventDefault(); const response = await fetch('/hireform',{ method:'POST', body:JSON.stringify(eventForm), headers:{ 'Content-Type':'application/json' } }) } return(
